msbt.message: Some kind of big event thing's gonna happen soon, but I didn't catch what it was. Gah! I hate mysteries!
All set for the big shindig tomorrow? I'm so ready! 's never seen anything like it!I love watching everyone get so mega hyped. This is gonna be a blast, !

You set for the Fishing Tourney on Saturday? I'm kinda bad at fishing, but I can't turn down a challenge.I'm going all in, so don't let your guard down or there's not gonna be anything left to catch! Bring it!

The Fishing Tourney's tomorrow! I think I'm gettin' waaaay too hyped. Like, I should chill, .Usually I think fishing's kinda dull, but there's something mega thrilling about battling a tug on your line.Plus, I love me some competition!
You gonna do the big Bug-Off on Saturday? I'm not a bug-catching pro or nothin', but I gotta try!Think you got what it takes to outcatch me? Bet you don't! But you probably do
Yo! The Bug-Off's tomorrow. You ready for this? Those bugs ain't gonna know what netted 'em!Oh, also DO NOT trample the flowers when you're running around, or you're gonna answer to ME!
The fireworks show is tomorrow. Are you revved up? 'Cause I'm totally revved up, .Seeing all that color hit the sky is gonna be way rad. I can't wait!
Oh, right! Happy Home Academy's coming by tomorrow, aren't they?Well, my place's decked out me-style, so I don't care what they think I should really clean though.
Hey! Have you seen your Happy Home Academy results yet?Mine wereabout what you'd expect. It's really weird having your style picked apart, .
The year's gonna be gone before you know it. You ready to give a solid send-off, ?
New Year's Eve is tomorrow! You KNOW I'm psyched! It's so wild that 's nearly done, .The Countdown party's in the plaza. We're gonna give the new year a rockin' welcome. See you there!
Tom Nook told me he's planning some kind of off-island thing for May Day, .Any idea what it'll be? Knowing him, it's probably a remote workshop for or something

I've spent a week trying to get Tom Nook to tell me about his big off-island May Day event thing.So far all I've got is something about needing a May Day Ticket to go, but that's it. He can really keep a secret!Oh well. Tomorrow's May Day, and Tom Nook told me he'd fill us in then. I guess we're waitin', .
It's almost Halloween! October 31st is right around the corner.Better get your candy and costume in gear, 'cause this Halloween is gonna rock super hard, !
Tomorrow! Halloween! Tricks! Treats! You ready? You got a costume picked out? I'm so hyped, !

I'm counting the days now until Turkey Day! I'm gonna get up early for once to chow down at the plaza.I've been working on a few ideas for stuff to cook too. You'll see. Just gotta find the ingredients, and bam!
Turkey Day's tomorrow! Our chance to give thanks for all the good food here on !And wait till you see what I'm gonna cook up! I'm putting a lot of love in it. Also a lot of lovage.
You ready for Toy Day? It'll be here sooner than you think, !I drive myself crazy every year tryin' to figure out what to get folks. Even so, it's kinda fun to think about.

Tomorrow is Toy Day, and I got this in the BAG! Which is a nice change of pace, for me.I wanna tell you so bad what I got everyone, but you'll see tomorrow.MAN! Who knew secrets were this hard to keep, ?!

Oh yeah! Festivale's coming up, isn't it? Huh! It's not like me to forget a partyespecially a big dance party!But it's all good. Just means I get to hype myself up for a rockin' good time all over again, !
I can't believe tomorrow's Festivale. I'd swear New Year's was just, like, yesterday, .Oh well! Doesn't matter! I'm hyped, and I'm ready for some dancin'!
